analysis.summary: Jabor Y. emails Jeffrey Epstein congratulating him on Trump's presidential victory and offering support for new opportunities, while updating him on progress with an e-currency project involving unspecified 'Sharia guys' and suggesting future meetings in Marrakech or New York.
